en: I love thee, O Jehovah, my strength.
hmr: Aw LALPA ka hrâtna, ka hmangai che.

en: Jehovah is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; My God, my rock, in whom I will take refuge; My shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower.
hmr: LALPA chu ka lungpui le, ka kulpui le a mi sanhimtu a nih; Ka Pathien, ka lungpui dettak a nih, amaa chun ka ringna innghat ka tih; Ka phaw le, ka sandamna ki le, ka kulbîng insâng a nih.

en: I will call upon Jehovah, who is worthy to be praised: So shall I be saved from mine enemies.
hmr: Inpâktlâk LALPA chu ko ka ta, Chuongchun, a mi dotuhaia inthawkin sanhimin um ka tih.

en: The cords of death compassed me, And the floods of ungodliness made me afraid.
hmr: Thina hruihruolhai chun a mi zem a, Pathien ngaisak nawna tuilienhai chun a mi sukṭi bawk a.

en: The cords of Sheol were round about me; The snares of death came upon me.
hmr: Seol hruihruolhai chun a mi khuop tlat a, Thina chânghai chun a mi âwk a;

en: In my distress I called upon Jehovah, And cried unto my God: He heard my voice out of his temple, And my cry before him came into his ears.
hmr: Ka lunginzîngin LALPA chu ka ko hlak a, Ka Pathien ka ko hlak; Ama chun a biekina inthawk chun ka râwl chu a hriet a, A hmaha ka khêkri chu a naah a lût tah a.

en: Then the earth shook and trembled; The foundations also of the mountains quaked And were shaken, because he was wroth.
hmr: Chu phingle chun hnuoi hi ân hnîng a, ân thin tah a, A lunginsen leiin tlânghai khawm chu, Ân nghatna pumin ân thinin ân hnîng tah a.

en: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, And fire out of his mouth devoured: Coals were kindled by it.
hmr: A hnâra inthawk chu meikhu ân tung ta ngut ngut a, A baua suok mei chun a kâng ta dur dur a; Chu chun meihawl khawm chu a sukchawk ta hum hum a.

en: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; And thick darkness was under his feet.
hmr: Ama chun vânhai khawm chu ân kûntir a, a ṭum tah a. A ke hnuoia chun inthim sâmup hi a hung um tah a.

en: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly; Yea, he soared upon the wings of the wind.
hmr: Cherub chungah a chuong a, a vuong tah a; Anih, thli thlaahai chun a vuong thuok thuok a.

en: He made darkness his hiding-place, his pavilion round about him, Darkness of waters, thick clouds of the skies.
hmr: Inthim hi ân bîkhmangna hmunah, ama inhuol vêlna bûktêah a siem a, Tuia inthimna vâna sûm sâmuphai chu.

en: At the brightness before him his thick clouds passed, Hailstones and coals of fire.
hmr: A hmaa vara inthawk chun a sûm sâmuphai chu an inkieng a, Ṭêk le rielhai chu a tla ta ur ur a

en: Jehovah also thundered in the heavens, And the Most High uttered his voice, Hailstones and coals of fire.
hmr: LALPA chu vânahai khin ân ri ta dur dur bawk a, Achunghnungtak chun a râwl ân suoh a, Rielso le ṭêk mei inhlap ri ân ri rum rum a

en: And he sent out his arrows, and scattered them; Yea, lightnings manifold, and discomfited them.
hmr: Chun, a thalhai chu a kâp suok a, anni chu a sukdar a, Anih, kâwlhai ân leptir zawt zawt zing a, a sukbuoi tâwl tah a.

en: Then the channels of waters appeared, And the foundations of the world were laid bare, At thy rebuke, O Jehovah, At the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.
hmr: Chu phingleh, Aw LALPA, i kâwkna leiin, I hnâra inthuok suok chun a mût rak leiin, Tui luongnahai chu a hung inlang a; Leilung innghatna chu suklangin a um tah a.

en: He sent from on high, he took me; He drew me out of many waters.
hmr: Ama chun chungtienga inthawkin a hung ban a, a mi chel a; Tui tamtaka inthawk chu a mi kei suok tah a.

en: He delivered me from my strong enemy, And from them that hated me; for they were too mighty for me.
hmr: A mi dotu hrâttaka inthawk chun a mi sanhim tah a; A mi theidatuhaia inthawk khawmin; Keia ta ding chun an hrât talaw sih a.

en: They came upon me in the day of my calamity; But Jehovah was my stay.
hmr: Anni chun ka vângduoi ni chun an mi thawh a, Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chu ka sawng tak a nih.

en: He brought me forth also into a large place; He delivered me, because he delighted in me.
hmr: Ama chun hmun inthâwltakah a mi ṭhuoi suok a, Ka chungah a lâwm leiin a mi lo sanhim tah a nih.

en: Jehovah hath rewarded me according to my righteousness; According to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
hmr: LALPA chun ka felzie ang ngeiin ka chungah a thawh a, Ka kuthai ân thieng ang ngeiin a mi thung a nih.

en: For I have kept the ways of Jehovah, And have not wickedly departed from my God.
hmr: LALPA lampuihai chu ka hrawh a, Ka Pathien kuoma inthawkin rilotakin ka fe hmang ngai si nawh a.

en: For all his ordinances were before me, And I put not away his statutes from me.
hmr: A dânhai po po ka hmaah a um hlak a, A thuruothai chu ka pei ngai si nawh a.

en: I was also perfect with him, And I kept myself from mine iniquity.
hmr: Ama kuoma chun demkailo ka lo na, Ka khawhlonaa inthawk chun kân siekieng hlak.

en: Therefore hath Jehovah recompensed me according to my righteousness, According to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
hmr: Chuleiin, LALPA chun ka felzie ang peiin a mi thung tah a, Ka kuthai a mithmuah ân thieng ang peiin.

en: With the merciful thou wilt show thyself merciful; With the perfect man thou wilt show thyself perfect;
hmr: Mi lunginsietthei tak kuoma chun lunginsietthei takin insuklang i ta, Mi ṭha famkim kuoma chun ṭha famkimin insuklang i tih.

en: With the pure thou wilt show thyself pure; And with the perverse thou wilt show thyself froward.
hmr: Mi inthieng kuoma chun inthiengin insuklang i ta, Chun, mi kâwmaw kuoma chun kâwmaw takin insuklang i tih.

en: For thou wilt save the afflicted people; But the haughty eyes thou wilt bring down.
hmr: Rinum tuor mihai chu i sandam ding a ni sih a, Mi chapohai ruok chu suktlâwm i tih.

en: For thou wilt light my lamp: Jehovah my God will lighten my darkness.
hmr: Nangin ka khâwnvar hi i mi sitpêk ding a ni sih a, LALPA ka Pathien chun kân thimna hi sukvar a tih.

en: For by thee I run upon a troop; And by my God do I leap over a wall.
hmr: Nangma iṭhangpuiin, râl ka baw sih a, Ka Pathien ṭhangpui bawkin kul bang chu châwm hlîm ka tih.

en: As for God, his way is perfect: The word of Jehovah is tried; He is a shield unto all them that take refuge in him.
hmr: Pathien chu a lampui chu a ṭhafamkim a, LALPA thu chu fie a ni tah a, Amaha ringna innghattuhai po po ta ding chun ama chu phaw a nih.

en: For who is God, save Jehovah? And who is a rock, besides our God,
hmr: LALPA naw chu tu am Pathien a um a? Ei Pathien naw chu tu am lungpui a um a?

en: The God that girdeth me with strength, And maketh my way perfect?
hmr: Hrâtnaa ka tâia mi khittu le, Ka lampui sukṭha famkimtu Pathien chu.

en: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet: And setteth me upon my high places.
hmr: Ama chun ka ke hi sazukpui ke angin a siem a, Ka hmun insângtakahai a min umtir hlak a.

en: He teacheth my hands to war; So that mine arms do bend a bow of brass.
hmr: Ka kuthai hi râl kâp dingin ân chûktir hlak a, Chuongchun, ka bânhai hin dâr thalngul a kuoi zo hiel a.

en: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation; And thy right hand hath holden me up, And thy gentleness hath made me great.
hmr: Nangin i sandamna phaw chu i mi pêk bawk a: I kut changtiengin i mi kei a, I inngaitlâwmna chun a mi siem lien tah a.

en: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, And my feet have not slipped.
hmr: Ka hnuoia ka kalchawina chu i suklien a, Chuongchun, ka kehai hi ân tleu nawh.

en: I will pursue mine enemies, and overtake them; Neither will I turn again till they are consumed.
hmr: A mi dotuhai chu hnawt ka ta, hnawt phâk el ka tih, Sukbohmanga an um hmakhat chun nghakîr ta naw bawk ka tih.

en: I will smite them through, so that they shall not be able to rise: They shall fall under my feet.
hmr: An tho nâwk thei nawna dingin sât sawk ka ta, Ka ke hnuoia hin tlu tâwl an tih.

en: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: Thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.
hmr: Nangin inthawnaa ding chun hrâtnain ka tâiah i mi khit a, A mi hung thawtuhai chu ka hnuoiah i suktlâwm tah a.

en: Thou hast also made mine enemies turn their backs unto me, That I might cut off them that hate me.
hmr: A mitheidatuhai chu ka sukbohmang theina dingin, Nangin a mi dotuhai chu hnung mîn nghatin în umtir ta bawk a.

en: They cried, but there was none to save; Even unto Jehovah, but he answered them not.
hmr: Anni chu an khêk a, nisienla- khawm, sandamtu ding tukhawm an um si nawh, LALPA ngei chu an ko va, nisienlakhawm, a dawn si nawh.

en: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind; I did cast them out as the mire of the streets.
hmr: Chu phingleh, pilvut thli ilên ang el hin ka vuok nâwi neng a, Tuollaia chirhak ang el hin ka peihâwn tah a.

en: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people; Thou hast made me the head of the nations: A people whom I have not known shall serve me.
hmr: Nangin mihai insuolnaa inthawk chun i mi sanhim tah a, Hnam tinhai lua chun i mi siem tah a. Ka hriet ngailo mihai chun ka rawng bâwl tâng an tih.

en: As soon as they hear of me they shall obey me; The foreigners shall submit themselves unto me.
hmr: Ka chanchin an hriet phingleh ka thu awi an ta, Hmêlmak mihai chu ka kuomah intuklût an tih.

en: The foreigners shall fade away, And shall come trembling out of their close places.
hmr: Hmêlmak mihai chu hung zuoi an ta, An kulbînga inthawk chun inthin pumin hung suok an tih.

en: Jehovah liveth; and blessed be my rock; And exalted be the God of my salvation,
hmr: LALPA chu a hring zing a, ka lungpui chu inpâkin um raw se, A mi sandamtu Pathien chu chawimawiin um raw se.

en: Even the God that executeth vengeance for me, And subdueth peoples under me.
hmr: Phuba mi lapêktu le, Mi tin ka hnuoia suktlâwmtu Pathien ngei chu.

en: He rescueth me from mine enemies; Yea, thou liftest me up above them that rise up against me; Thou deliverest me from the violent man.
hmr: Ama chun a mi dotuhaia in- thawk chun a mi sansuok a, Anih, nangin a mi thawtuhai chungtieng chun i mi dawm kâng a, Mi nunrâwnga inthawk chun i mi sanhim hlak.

en: Therefore I will give thanks unto thee, O Jehovah, among the nations, And will sing praises unto thy name.
hmr: Chuleiin, aw LALPA, hnam tin lai chun lâwmthu hril ka ti cheh a, I hming inpâkin hla sak bawk ka tih.

en: Great deliverance giveth he to his king, And showeth lovingkindness to his anointed, To David and to his seed, for evermore.
hmr: Ama chun hnena ropuitak a lal siem kuoma chun a pêk hlak a, A hrieknâl chungah, David le a thlahai chung ngeia chun, Kumkhawtluongin a ngilneizie inlangtir a tih.
